mapper.select: SELECT AA.* FROM (SELECT A.* , floor( (RNUM-1) / #{rows} + 1 ) as pageNumber FROM (SELECT * , @rnum := @rnum + 1 as RNUM , date_format(MOD_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') FROM PICTURE_BOARD , (SELECT @rnum := 0) R WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY SEQ_NO DESC) A )AA WHERE AA.pageNumber = #{page};
SELECT count(*) AS TOTAL_COUNT FROM PICTURE_BOARD WHERE USE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT AA.* FROM (SELECT A.* , floor( (RNUM-1) / #{rows} + 1 ) as pageNumber FROM (SELECT B.* , @rnum := @rnum + 1 as RNUM , date_format(B.MOD_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') FROM ( SELECT m.*, f.fcnt FROM picture_board m LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT *, count(board_no) as fcnt FROM picture_board_favorite WHERE use_yn = 'Y' GROUP BY board_no ) f ON m.SEQ_NO = f.BOARD_NO WHERE m.USE_YN = 'Y' GROUP BY m.seq_no ORDER BY fcnt DESC ) B , (SELECT @rnum := 0) R )A )AA WHERE AA.pageNumber = #{page};

SELECT AA.* FROM (SELECT A.* , floor( (RNUM-1) / #{rows} + 1 ) as pageNumber FROM (SELECT B.* , @rnum := @rnum + 1 as RNUM , date_format(B.MOD_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') FROM ( SELECT * FROM PICTURE_BOARD WHERE title LIKE '%${keyword}%' AND USE_YN = 'Y')B , (SELECT @rnum := 0) R ORDER BY SEC_NO DESC )A )AA WHERE AA.pageNumber = #{page};
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM PICTURE_BOARD WHERE TITLE LIKE '%${_parameter}%' AND USE_YN = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PICTURE_BOARD( TITLE, CONTENT, WRITER, URL ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, #{url} )
mapper.select: SELECT A.SEQ_NO, A.TITLE, A.WRITER, A.CONTENT, DATE_FORMAT(A.MOD_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS MOD_DATE, DATE_FORMAT(A.REG_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS REG_DATE, A.URL, IFNULL(B.FAVORITE_COUNT, 0) FAVORITE_COUNT FROM PICTURE_BOARD A LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT *, COUNT(*) AS FAVORITE_COUNT FROM PICTURE_BOARD_FAVORITE WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' GROUP BY BOARD_NO) B ON A.SEQ_NO = B.BOARD_NO WHERE A.SEQ_NO = #{_parameter};

SELECT SEQ_NO, BOARD_NO, CONTENT, WRITER, DATE_FORMAT(MOD_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS MOD_DATE, DATE_FORMAT(REG_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS REG_DATE, USE_YN FROM PICTURE_BOARD_REPLY WHERE BOARD_NO = #{_parameter} AND USE_YN = 'Y';
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PICTURE_BOARD_FAVORITE (BOARD_NO, MEMBER_ID) VALUES (#{boardNo}, #{id}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE use_yn = 'Y'
